titles.title: Truth in Employment Act of 2011
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to protect employer rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 6/13/2011--Introduced. Truth in Employment Act of 2011 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to provide that nothing in specified prohibitions against unfair labor practices by employers shall be construed as requiring an employer to employ any person who seeks or has sought employment with the employer in furtherance of other employment or agency status.
